doc.title: The Gift
doc.plot: Life Coach, ex-Navy Seal, and motivational speaker, Richard Machowicz embarks on turning the fate of the Herron family around. They are a family of 6, living in a motel room and are in desperate need of help. Richard attempts to give the family the tools they will need to secure jobs, better their family life, take on responsibility and get an helping hand. Richard will have 14 days to turn their life around by giving them "the gift".
